relics.name: Angel Wings
relics.flavorText: The source of your dark energy.

keywords.name: [B]
keywords.description: Energy is used to play cards from your hand.

keywords.name: [E]
keywords.description: Energy is used to play cards from your hand.

keywords.name: [G]
keywords.description: Energy is used to play cards from your hand.

keywords.name: [R]
keywords.description: Energy is used to play cards from your hand.

keywords.name: Artifact
keywords.description: Negates the next debuff.

keywords.name: Autoplay
keywords.description: This card automatically plays itself when drawn.

keywords.name: Block
keywords.description: Until next turn, prevents damage.

keywords.name: Burn
keywords.description: Burns are unplayable status cards that damage you.

keywords.name: Channel
keywords.description: Channeling an Orb puts it into your first empty slot. If you have no empty slots, your first Orb is automatically Evoked to make room.

keywords.name: Chika
keywords.description: A Little Demon with 14 HP and can deal 6 damage to the lowest HP enemy or heal all Summons for 3 HP. Evolving makes Chika's attack do 2 more damage.

keywords.name: Confused
keywords.description: Whenever you draw a card, randomize its cost.

keywords.name: Curse
keywords.description: Curse cards are negative cards that stay in your deck.

keywords.name: Dark
keywords.description: Orb: Increases damage every turn. When Evoked, deals damage to the enemy with the least HP.

keywords.name: Dazed
keywords.description: Dazed are unplayable status cards.

keywords.name: Dexterity
keywords.description: Dexterity improves Block gained from cards.

keywords.name: Dodge
keywords.description: Next attack you take deals 0 damage.

keywords.name: Ethereal
keywords.description: If this card is in your hand at the end of turn, it is exhausted. Exhausted cards are removed from your deck until the end of combat.

keywords.name: Evoke
keywords.description: Consume your rightmost Orb and use its Evoke effect.

keywords.name: Evolves
keywords.description: Everything done by the Summon gets more effective by 1 and raise max HP by 3.

keywords.name: Exhaust
keywords.description: Removed until end of combat.

keywords.name: Exhaustive
keywords.description: Exhausts after a certain number of uses.

keywords.name: Fallen
keywords.description: Used to pay for cards that require it. Gain 2 per turn.

keywords.name: Fetch
keywords.description: Choose a specified card from a specified pile and place it into your hand.

keywords.name: Fleeting
keywords.description: This card Purges and is removed from your deck on use.

keywords.name: Focus
keywords.description: Focus increases the effectiveness of Channeled Orbs.

keywords.name: Frail
keywords.description: While Frail, gain 25% less Block from cards.

keywords.name: Frost
keywords.description: Orb: Gains Block.

keywords.name: Grave
keywords.description: Start each combat with this card in your discard pile.

keywords.name: Hanamaru
keywords.description: A Little Demon with 14 HP and can apply 7 Sin to ALL enemies, give 5 Block to ALL allies and herself, or Exhume one card one time only..

keywords.name: Innate
keywords.description: Start each combat with this card in your hand.

keywords.name: Intangible
keywords.description: Reduce ALL damage taken and HP loss to 1.

keywords.name: Lightning
keywords.description: Orb: Deals damage to random enemies.

keywords.name: Lily
keywords.description: A Little Demon with 15 HP and can either deal 5 damage to a random enemy, or give you 3 Fallen Energy.

keywords.name: Lock-on
keywords.description: Lock-On targets receive 50% more damage from Orbs.

keywords.name: Locked
keywords.description: This card has yet to be unlocked.

keywords.name: Mari
keywords.description: A Little Demon with 12 HP and can deal 10 damage to the lowest HP enemy, Evolve or gain 2 Intangible in exchange for 5 HP. Evolving increases Mari's attack damage by 6.

keywords.name: Minion
keywords.description: A friendly monster that fights for you and has a chance to receive Vulnerable, Weak, Frail, or Strength loss instead of you.

keywords.name: Opener
keywords.description: Opener cards may only be played as the first card each turn.

keywords.name: Plasma
keywords.description: Orb: Gains Energy.

keywords.name: Poison
keywords.description: Poisoned creatures lose HP at the start of their turn. Each turn, Poison is reduced by 1.

keywords.name: Purge
keywords.description: Removed until end of combat. Does NOT go to your exhaust pile.

keywords.name: Refund
keywords.description: Returns energy spent on playing the card, up to the Refund value.

keywords.name: Retain
keywords.description: Not discarded at the end of your turn.

keywords.name: Ruby
keywords.description: A Little Demon with 20 HP and can either deal 4 damage to all enemies, or give you 9 Block.

keywords.name: Secret
keywords.description: These cards are retained and have effects while in the hand. Can be played for no effect.

keywords.name: Shiv
keywords.description: Shivs are 0 cost Attack cards which Exhaust.

keywords.name: Sin
keywords.description: Deal and take extra damage equal to the amount of Sin a monster has. Removed upon being hit.

keywords.name: Snecko
keywords.description: When drawn, this card randomizes its cost.

keywords.name: Soulbound
keywords.description: Cannot be removed from your deck.

keywords.name: Startup
keywords.description: Triggers at the start of each combat.

keywords.name: Status
keywords.description: Status cards are removed at the end of combat.

keywords.name: Strength
keywords.description: Strength adds additional damage to attacks.

keywords.name: Strike
keywords.description: Any card with the word "Strike" in its name.

keywords.name: Summon
keywords.description: Summon an ally to help you in battle. There can only be maximum two summons out at a time. You cannot summon more than one of the same kind of Summon.

keywords.name: Temporary hp
keywords.description: Temporary HP disappears at the end of combat.

keywords.name: Thorns
keywords.description: When receiving Attack damage, deals damage back.

keywords.name: Transform
keywords.description: Transformed cards become a random card of any rarity.

keywords.name: Unknown
keywords.description: This card has yet to be encountered.

keywords.name: Unplayable
keywords.description: Unplayable cards cannot be played from your hand.

keywords.name: Upgrade
keywords.description: Upgrading cards makes them more powerful. Cards can only be upgraded once.

keywords.name: Void
keywords.description: Voids are unplayable status cards that consume energy when drawn.

keywords.name: Vulnerable
keywords.description: Vulnerable creatures take 50% more damage from Attacks.

keywords.name: Weak
keywords.description: Weakened creatures deal 25% less damage with Attacks.

keywords.name: Wound
keywords.description: Wounds are unplayable status cards.
